articles.author: Jeremy Werner
articles.title: Quick hits: No. 19 Indiana embarrasses No. 9 Illinois 63-10 in worst loss of Bret Bielema's tenure - 247Sports
articles.description: Indiana completely outclassed Illinois in the Big Ten opener for both teams
articles.content:
BLOOMINGTON, Ind. — Hours before the game, Indiana fans swarmed the tailgates around Memorial Stadium, looking jovial and primed for a party.
The No. 19-ranked Hoosiers obliged them with plenty of c… [+5449 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Caitlin Clark says she was fined $200 for social media post about referees - ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
articles.description: She tweeted “Refs couldn't stop us" after Indiana's Game 2 win.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS -- Caitlin Clark said referees couldnt stop her Indiana Fever. The WNBA made her pay for it.
The Fever's All-Star guard, who is sidelined for the postseason with a right groin injury, post… [+737 chars]
